title: WM Judge

fields.name: Judging Attributes:
fields.value:
- You are unable to judge on night one.

- When you judge your targets, you must correctly guess what each of their roles are.

- All Town roles must be guessed exactly, but you cannot guess any Town Investigative roles.

- All Mafia roles only require that you guess them as Mafia to be counted as a correct guess.

- All Neutral roles only require the correct alignment to be counted as a correct guess.

- If your guess is not completely correct, you will learn how many of your guesses were correct, but not which ones were correct.

- You ignore framing of any kind.

- Your judging visits are Astral.

fields.name: Executing Attributes:
fields.value:
- When you correctly guess all three of your target's roles, you will execute each of them with an Astral Unstoppable attack.

- If one of your targets does not die for any reason but you stilled judged all three roles correctly, you will still win.

- If there are less than three other players (that you can judge) alive, you will commit suicide and lose.

- When you achieve your goal, you will no longer be able to judge anyone, and you will no longer have Basic defense.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Successfully judge and execute three players.
